name: Barrel Aged Sangria
description: Enjoy Red or White 1/2 Carafe...19, Full Carafe...38
serverNotes: House specialty barrel-aged sangria available in red or white. Aged in oak barrels for smooth, complex flavor. Wine-based with fresh fruit, citrus, and subtle oak notes. Perfect for sharing‚Äîorder half carafe ($19) or full carafe ($38). Great for groups, celebrations, or warm weather drinking. Pairs beautifully with appetizers, charcuterie, pizza, and lighter Italian fare. Refreshing alternative to wine by the glass. House-made recipe that's become a Via signature. Popular choice for brunch, lunch, or dinner.

name: Casa-Mopolitan
description: Tito's Vodka, Triple Sec, Cranberry, Fresh Lime
serverNotes:
üíñ CHARITY COCKTAIL: [Tito's Handmade Vodka](https://www.titosvodka.com/) is donating $1 per cocktail up to $10K (Nov 1, 2025-Jan 31, 2026) to [CASA Project Worcester County](https://casaprojectworcester.org/). Every order helps kids in foster care!

üç∏ PROFILE: Classic Cosmopolitan | Tito's vodka, triple sec, cranberry & fresh lime | Bright, tart & refreshing | Garnished with lemon twist | The name cleverly combines CASA with cosmopolitan!

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Appetizers, salads, light Italian fare, celebration meals.

üí° SERVING TIP: Serve chilled in martini glass. Mention the charity‚Äîit's a feel-good order! Perfect for guests who love classics with a purpose.

name: Golden Paloma
description: Mi Campo Blanco, Lime, Cinnamon Maple Syrup, Grapefruit
serverNotes:
üåÖ üìñ ABOUT: Elevated Paloma featuring [Mi Campo Blanco](https://www.micampotequila.com/) tequila (100% Blue Weber agave). Craft tequila from Jalisco, Mexico!

üç∏ PROFILE: Paloma Reimagined | Mi Campo Blanco, fresh lime, house-made cinnamon maple syrup & grapefruit | Bright citrus with warm spice notes | Beautiful golden color | The cinnamon maple adds autumn complexity!

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Mexican dishes, seafood, tacos, spicy appetizers, fish dishes.

üí° SERVING TIP: Serve in rocks glass over ice. Perfect for tequila lovers seeking beyond margaritas! Great year-round, especially fall/winter. Popular brunch & happy hour choice!

name: Perfect Pear
description: House Vodka by Tree House, Spiced Pear Liqueur, Vanilla, Lemon
serverNotes:
üçê üìñ ABOUT: Elegant autumnal cocktail featuring [Tree House Vodka](https://treehousebrewing.com/) from Massachusetts. Known for their world-class IPA, now crafting premium spirits!

üç∏ PROFILE: Fruit-Forward & Sophisticated | Tree House vodka, spiced pear liqueur, vanilla & fresh lemon | Smooth with warm baking spices | Lemon twist garnish | Vanilla adds creamy sweetness!

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Cheese plates, pork dishes, autumn salads, desserts.

üí° SERVING TIP: Serve chilled in coupe glass. Perfect for guests who enjoy unique fruit cocktails with depth! Great fall/winter choice but enjoyed year-round. Beautiful presentation!

name: Carnivale
description: Drumshanbo Brazilian Pineapple Gin, Yuzu, Lime, Cane Sugar, br√ªl√©ed lime
serverNotes:
üéâ üìñ ABOUT: Brazilian-inspired cocktail featuring [Drumshanbo Gunpowder Gin](https://www.drumshanbo.com/) with pineapple. Irish gin infused with tropical botanicals from Brazil!

üç∏ PROFILE: Tropical & Festive | Drumshanbo pineapple gin, exotic yuzu (Japanese citrus), fresh lime & cane sugar | Br√ªl√©ed lime garnish creates stunning presentation | Yuzu = lemon meets mandarin!

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Spicy dishes, ceviche, Thai food, tropical desserts.

üí° SERVING TIP: Serve in rocks glass with br√ªl√©ed lime. Perfect for adventurous guests who love tropical with sophistication! Great celebration cocktail or warm weather choice. The name captures carnival spirit!

name: Blueberry Bombshell
description: Blueberry Vodka, Lemon Sorbet, Pineapple, Prosecco Float
serverNotes:
üíô üìñ ABOUT: Fun, fruity Instagram-worthy cocktail! Blueberry vodka, lemon sorbet, pineapple with Prosecco float. Light, refreshing & celebration-ready! Also available as Mocktail ($10).

üç∏ PROFILE: Berry-Tropical Fusion | Blueberry vodka, lemon sorbet, pineapple & Prosecco float | Beautiful layered effect | Elegant bubbles on top | Sweet, fun & not too strong!

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Brunch dishes, fruit desserts, light salads, appetizers.

üí° SERVING TIP: Serve in tall glass with layers. The sorbet keeps it cold while creating visual appeal! Perfect for celebrations or warm weather. Crowd-pleasing & approachable!

name: Mango Inferno
description: Ghost Tequila, Mango, Jalape√±o, Pineapple, Lime
serverNotes:
üî• üìñ ABOUT: Bold spicy-sweet cocktail featuring [Ghost Tequila](https://ghosttequila.com/)‚Äîsmooth 100% Blue Weber agave from Jalisco, Mexico. For spice lovers!

üç∏ PROFILE: Tropical Heat | Ghost tequila, fresh mango, jalape√±o, pineapple & lime | Sweet fire perfectly balanced | Real jalape√±o kick! | Mango & pineapple cool the heat!

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Mexican dishes, spicy appetizers, wings, bold flavors.

üí° SERVING TIP: Ask guests about spice tolerance first! Serve in rocks glass with lime. Perfect for adventurous drinkers & spicy food lovers. The name captures the sweet fire! Popular choice for tequila enthusiasts.

name: Espresso Martini
description: Vanilla Vodka, Bepi Tossolini Espresso Liqueur, House-Brewed Espresso, Splash of Cream
serverNotes:
‚òï ABOUT: Classic espresso martini featuring [Bepi Tossolini Espresso Liqueur](https://www.bepitossolini.it/) from Italy + house-brewed fresh espresso. Both dessert & pick-me-up! ‚ö†Ô∏è Contains caffeine.

üç∏ PROFILE: Rich & Caffeinated | Vanilla vodka, Bepi Tossolini liqueur, fresh espresso & splash of cream | Beautiful foam on top | Authentic coffee flavor‚Äînot artificial! | 3 coffee bean garnish!

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Tiramisu, chocolate desserts, cannoli, Italian sweets.

üí° SERVING TIP: Shake vigorously for foam! Serve in martini glass. Perfect after-dinner for coffee lovers who want elegant finish. Popular for late dinners or energy with elegance! Mention caffeine to guests.

name: Mi Casa, Su Casa
description: Bribon Reposado, Fresh Lime Juice, Agave Nectar, Shiraz Float, br√ªl√©ed Lime
serverNotes:
üè† üìñ ABOUT: Creative margarita featuring [Bribon Reposado](https://bribontequila.com/) tequila (oak-aged 100% agave from Jalisco). Means 'my house, your house'‚Äîwelcoming & shareable!

üç∏ PROFILE: Margarita Reimagined | Bribon reposado, fresh lime, agave nectar & Shiraz wine float | Beautiful ombre effect! | Oak character from reposado | Br√ªl√©ed lime adds caramelized wow!

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Mexican dishes, grilled meats, spicy appetizers, bold flavors.

üí° SERVING TIP: Serve in rocks glass. The red wine float adds depth & visual drama! Great conversation starter. Perfect for tequila lovers seeking innovation beyond standard margaritas. Popular with margarita fans!

name: Mind Over Matter
description: House Vodka by Tree House, Plantation Pineapple Rum, Aperol, Blood Orange Sorbet, Lemon, Lime, and Pineapple Juices
serverNotes: Vibrant signature cocktail with Tree House vodka, Plantation pineapple rum, Aperol, blood orange sorbet, lemon, and lime. Bright, refreshing, and beautifully layered. The blood orange sorbet creates stunning color while keeping it cold. Aperol adds Italian bitter-orange character. Multiple citrus creates complexity. Perfect for guests who love bright, refreshing cocktails with sophistication. Great warm weather choice or aperitif. Also available as a Mocktail for $10. Pairs wonderfully with seafood, salads, light appetizers, and citrus dishes. The name suggests mental triumph. Popular choice for those seeking something unique and photogenic.

name: The Via Mai Tai
description: Privateer Rum, Gosling's Dark Rum, Amaretto, Orgeat Syrup, Fresh Lime, Pineapple Juice and Amarena Cherry *ALLERGY: This drink recipe contains Almonds*
serverNotes: Via's twist on the classic Mai Tai with Privateer Rum, Gosling's Dark Rum, amaretto, orgeat syrup, fresh lime, pineapple juice, and Amarena cherry. Tropical, nutty, and complex. Dual rums provide depth - Privateer for brightness, Gosling's for richness. Amaretto adds almond sweetness and Italian character. Orgeat syrup (almond-based) brings authentic tiki flavor. Tropical flavors with sophisticated depth. IMPORTANT: Contains almonds‚Äîalways mention allergen. Perfect for tiki cocktail lovers. Pairs wonderfully with tropical dishes, spicy food, and island-inspired cuisine. Beautiful presentation with cherry garnish. Popular celebration choice.

name: Il Gentiluomo (The Gentleman)
description: BroVo London Dry Gin, Elderflower Liqueur, Prosecco, Lemon
serverNotes: Elegant Italian-inspired signature cocktail with BroVo London Dry gin, elderflower liqueur, Prosecco, and fresh lemon. Light, floral, and sophisticated. The name means 'The Gentleman' in Italian‚Äîrefined and classy. Elderflower adds delicate floral sweetness. Prosecco brings bubbles and elegance. Refreshing and approachable yet complex. Perfect for guests who appreciate light, botanical cocktails. Great aperitif or celebration choice. Pairs wonderfully with seafood, salads, light appetizers, and Italian dishes. Beautiful presentation. Popular choice for those seeking something elegant and not too strong.

name: Plane Crash
description: Jefferson's Small Batch Bourbon Infused with Smoked Honey, Aperol, Amaro dell'Etna and Fresh Lemon
serverNotes: Bold, sophisticated signature cocktail inspired by the Paper Plane. Jefferson's bourbon infused with smoked honey, Aperol, Amaro dell'Etna, and fresh lemon. Complex, balanced, and conversation-worthy. The smoked honey adds depth and intrigue. Sicilian Amaro dell'Etna brings volcanic mineral character. Aperol provides bitter-orange brightness. Perfect for bourbon and amaro enthusiasts. For guests who appreciate craft cocktails with layers of flavor. Pairs excellently with charcuterie, grilled meats, Italian appetizers, and bold flavors. The name references the classic Paper Plane cocktail. Popular choice for cocktail connoisseurs.

name: Raspberry Mojito
description: Our classic made with Privateer Rum from Ipswich, MA
serverNotes: Via's signature take on the classic mojito with Privateer rum from Ipswich MA, fresh raspberries, mint, lime, and soda. Refreshing, fruity, and perfectly balanced. Made with local Massachusetts rum for New England pride. Fresh mint muddled for authentic mojito character. Raspberries add beautiful color and fruity sweetness. Also available as a Mocktail for $10. Perfect for warm weather, celebrations, or guests who love classic cocktails with a twist. Pairs wonderfully with salads, seafood, light dishes, and Cuban-inspired cuisine. Crowd-pleasing favorite.
